melee_weapon_moves.name: Poison Sting
melee_weapon_moves.effect: Poisons the target, dealing 1 HP damage for 3 turns

melee_weapon_moves.name: Power Strike
melee_weapon_moves.effect: Lowers user’s dexterity by 10% for the next turn

melee_weapon_moves.name: Adrenaline Surge
melee_weapon_moves.effect: Increases user’s attack and dexterity by 10% for 3 turns
